title: extra passive
body: why not give each champion an extra passive ability that benefits all champions on the team if that champion is chosen in the team. for example xin zhao could have his ability as all champions on the team gets 20% increased attack speed for the first 5 seconds after engaging an enemy champion and amumus could be all cc of all champions on the team lasts 0.25 seconds longer. this way each player can bring more to the team and people could pick champion combinations with synergy. also if someone goes afk its not as harsh as they will still benefit the team.

replies.body:
That would be broken, sure it'd benefit a team with an AFK, but it'd overpower a team without one

If this ever actually happens, i will quit league permanently, this is the dumbest thing riot could possibly do to the game, as if Season 10's Map changes weren't bad enough

that might take a while to balance, I liked that game mode where you choose creep wave type (not normal wave creeps) to benefit your champ/team plays with a credit but like 1 bonus creep per player and balance their kill cost for type in case of troll teams spamming a specific 1 to feed the enemy team or give them no cost
